metadata.job_location: Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

seniority_level.evidence: 5+ años de experiencia como ingeniero de datos or rol relacionado + explicit mentoring and review responsibilities for junior engineers

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer, core focus on data pipelines, data quality, and integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on data quality processes, rules, and anomaly resolution in the job description

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentoring junior engineers and reviewing implementations, but no mention of direct reports or people management

primary_cloud.evidence: GCP (Google Cloud Platform) mentioned explicitly as a focus area with intermediate experience required

secondary_clouds.evidence: Basic knowledge of otros entornos de nube (other cloud environments) mentioned, likely includes AWS and Azure

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions data pipelines for collecting data from multiple sources (batch) and staying updated on trends (could imply streaming), but no explicit tools or paradigms for streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No explicit mention of orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions data pipelines and models without specifying storage technology, but implies both raw data (lake) and structured data (warehouse) usage patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: No explicit work model or remote restrictions stated in the job posting

timezone_focus.evidence: Role is for a regional team covering Chile and US, suggesting collaboration across multiple timezones

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified as Las Condes, Santiago, but no mention of relocation requirements or packages

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of H1B sponsorship or visa-related details

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals regarding OPT/CPT or student visa eligibility

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of work authorization or citizenship requirements in the job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as full_time in Pass 1, typical for W2 roles in corporate settings

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits or compensation details mentioned in Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions providing mentoría (mentorship) to junior engineers and staying updated with trends, implying growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states Proporcionar orientación y mentoría a ingenieros de datos junior (provide guidance and mentorship to junior data engineers)

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement tracks in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: Mentions mentoring and technical leadership but no explicit career tracks beyond IC roles

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of required skills (Python, SQL, GCP) and preferred skills (Maestría, cloud certification, scripting languages) in the job posting

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focusing on data engineering tasks such as pipelines, data quality, and integration

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5+ years of experience aligns with senior-level expectations, and required skills are reasonable for the role
